body.name: Summer's Eve Blissful Escape Daily Refreshing All Over Feminine Body Wash, Removes Odor, Feminine Wash pH Balanced, 15 fl oz
features: Summer’s Eve Blissful Escape Daily Refreshing Feminine Wash removes odor-causing bacteria for all day freshness
During your shower enjoy an intimate care and feminine body wash that’s a refreshing, cleansing experience for under your arms, breasts, and even in your intimate area, so you can take on anything
Blissful Escape indulgent SafeScent is inspired by fruit, florals and vibrant berries and gentle enough for your most delicate skin
Summer’s Eve daily refreshing intimate wash is gynecologist tested, free from dyes and parabens, and the product is not tested on animals
Uniquely formulated and pH balanced to match the intimate area’s natural chemistry
Contains 1 bottle of Summer's Eve Blissful Escape Daily Refreshing Feminine Wash, 15 fl oz
body.description: A refreshing, cleansing experience for your intimate area so you can take on anything. Summer's Eve Refreshing feminine care products comes in a variety of indulgent SafeScents letting you experience that unique, everyday Summer’s Eve readiness. Summer's Eve Feminine Body Wash is created for your most intimate areas to gently cleanse away the bacteria that can cause odor. Uniquely formulated and pH-balanced to match your body's natural chemistry. All Summer's Eve feminine hygiene products, along with every unique scent, are gynecologist tested to ensure they are safe, even for sensitive skin. Blissful Escape indulgent SafeScent is inspired by fruit, florals and vibrant berries and refreshing enough for your most delicate skin. That’s why millions of women trust our expansive range of gynecologist-tested cleansing and care. Our wide variety of products are made for everybody – whether you’re at home or on the go, want to bask in fragrant lusciousness or no scent at all or want ultra-Refreshing or high performance. With every Summer’s Eve product you use, know that We See You, We Get You, We Got You. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 SafeScents 2 Odor-Causing Bacteria 3 Gynecologist Tested 4 pH-Balanced 5 Free From Dyes & Parabens

Summer's Eve Refresh Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Free from Parabens Tested SafeScents Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Free from Parabens Tested SafeScents

What do you mean by "Safe Scents"? We want to provide you with safe, best smelling products for your intimate care routine. All of our scented cosmetic products are clinically tested by gynecologists to ensure that they are safe, even for those of us with sensitive skin. What's the Refresh Collection? Our Refresh Collection is for those who love to bask in luscious fragrances. It has has an extensive range of fragrance levels, from a light, barely-there fragrance or a bold fragrance that gives you a long-lasting boost of freshness Why does pH matter? It's important to your body’s natural defense and maintaining a good environment for a healthy external vaginal area. The pH of ordinary soap, can be very basic (high pH) and may not complement the natural pH range of your external vaginal area. Isn’t Summer’s Eve and Fem Care just if you have a problem? I don’t have an issue “down there” … The external vaginal area is different than other parts of your body – its delicate, and has a different pH than other areas of the body – and so it needs a different kind of care. What can I do if I experience vaginal itching? If you are experiencing vaginal itching, we recommend you talk with your doctor or healthcare professional about your symptoms. If you know that you have a yeast infection, you can find relief with one of our Monistat products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: I really love this product not only is it a great brand but it does what it is supposed to. I have really sensitive skin especially in that area and the stuff was amazing. Not only does it smell good but it makes me feel very fresh and leaves my skin nice and soft. 10 out of 10 would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: good use for the $ and smells good and good for your use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice smelling body wash!
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin and it works amazing! I love the smell of it and it comes in a big container that lasts a long time. I've ordered the product multiple of times and I am never disappointed. Always comes nicely packed. I tried the other kinds previously and this one seems to be the best. It also has a thick consistency which shows that the quality of it is not cheap. Totally recommend it to any woman.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very good product
reviews.reviewText: this is not my first order. i like the quality and the price. I will recommend it to any female , but specially to ladies with sensitive skin. it has almost no scent .I will order it again for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it’s supposed to
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to just feel cleaner down there. I don’t like using my body soap because it’s high in chemicals and always ends up smelling a little off. This makes me feel GREAT and smell great too. I was surprised, I really didn’t think it’d work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product, bad packaging
reviews.reviewText: The product itself is good and smells really nice. However, the packaging was terrible. They were sealed in a 3-pack with plastic, but somehow one or more of the bottles opened and leaked through the plastic and into the shipping box. Had to wash all the bottles and other items in the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love that clean, fresh scent after use. Ladies, you will love this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great deal! I have two bathrooms so this bargain made it super simple to stock up! Smell is clean and refreshing. Did not disappoint. Great value.
Subtle sent. You will feel fresh all day long

The scent is subtle but you immediately feel fresher when used. I've been looking for a feminine hygiene product for a long time, I tried several. This one is just the best. I am a nurse and after a 12 or 16 hour shift I still feel fresh.
I love Summer's Eve products, and this scent is sweet. Love the scent and love using it.
Bought 2 bottles. Only one bottle is sealed . The other bottle spilled all over in the packaging. Just wondering if there was a QC check during packaging.
Product came leaking. The cap was defective and not able to be closed tightly. Other than that the product works great.
